messages.message: Hi! In the new extraction field type (list), i see we can now add attribute names and description. Does the description of the attribute contribute to the prompt, or is that just for notetaking?
this contributes (singificantly!) please make sure to fill descriptions of the attribute

Thank you! I asked as the top description has this subtitle:
```provide details to help the model find this data```
but not the attribute description’s subtitle.

Also, the "Semantic name" is supposed to represent a single name of an entity, with the attributes being features of that entity. so you would have something like
"Semantic name" - "Medical record"
attributes:
• Name of patient : <description>
• CRM number : ...
kind of like a json schema

if this is not obvious, perhaps we need to guide users a bit better :thinking_face: cc @Bastiane
@Natasha and I discussed the list editing panel design yesterday too that should address some of these confusions
We are moving away from semantic name to avoid confusion. And we will use both name and description in the prompt
